name: Word Cage - Free Word Search Game
name_original: Word Cage - Free Word Search Game
description:
Word Cage is a new relaxing word search game with an original gameplay, three game modes to choose from and thousands of possible words to be found!

The game is 100% free with no In-App purchases.

TIPS:
* longer words = better score!
* press on the selected letter to erase the whole word!
* press on the letter outside the group to deselect the whole group!

FEATURES:
* 100% free full version + no In-App purchases
* Three game modes
* Original & addicting word search game
* Global leaderboards included - compare your score with points of other people from all around the world!

Have fun with our app Word Cage and if you like it and want to see more free features, please support it by rating it and leaving some comment, thank you!

If you find any bug or have any question, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com.

Support links:
